org.denevell.briefwebserver
Class BriefWebServer

java.lang.Object
  org.denevell.briefwebserver.BriefWebServer

public class BriefWebServer
extends java.lang.Object

A simple web server to ues in unit / integration / system tests. You quickly start it up, give it some stub data at a path, and then close it down when your tests are finished.

Author:
denevell

          Start a webserver on port on host

getStringFromContext

public java.lang.String getStringFromContext(java.lang.String path)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
Utility method to skip all the url.openStream, BufferedReader.readLine(), etc rubbish

Parameters:
path - Minus the first slash, i.e. "the/url/here"
Returns:
The entire result of calling hostname:port/path
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there was a problem getting this data i.e couldn't connect, or bad path
